title: How to Prepare Organic Pesticides   Year 2022

subtasks: Collecting necessary ingredients (aloe vera, red pepper, tomato leaves, onion, marigold)
Crushing and chopping the ingredients into small pieces
Mixing the crushed ingredients in a container
Adding water to the mixture for a 3-day decoction
Straining the solution to remove solid particles
Diluting the concentrated solution to 10 liters
Storing the organic pesticide for application on crops
Crush and chop the ingredients (aloe vera, red pepper, tomato leaves, onion, marigold)

Mix the crushed/Chopped ingredients with water. They pour the crushed materials into a container and start adding water. Then, after combining, they let it sit for three days. So maybe "Add water to the mix for 3 days" is a subtask.
Crush and chop the ingredients (aloe vera, red pepper, tomato leaves, onion, marigold)
Mix the crushed ingredients with water in a container
Allow the mixture to sit for three days for decotion
Strain the mixture to remove solids
Dilute the solution to 10 liters with water

tasks.task: The MAINTASK is preparing an organic pesticide solution using aloe vera, red pepper, tomato leaves, onion, and marigold. The subtasks are:
subtasks: Crush and chop the necessary ingredients (aloe vera, red pepper, tomato leaves, onion, marigold).
Mix the crushed ingredients with water in a container.
Allow the mixture to sit for three days for decoction.
Strain the mixture to remove solid particles.
Dilute the solution to 10 liters with water.
